full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHI YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BYA BA 'BANGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS, PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS, YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DBANG PO'I, SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
